articles.description: Follow live BBC radio commentary and text updates as Japan play Rugby World Cup debutants Chile in Pool D.

articles.description: Follow live BBC One coverage and text commentary of the Great North Run as Mo Farah takes part in his final competitive race before retirement.
articles.title: Watch: Great North Run - Farah runs final race of career

articles.description: Britain's four-time Olympic champion Mo Farah brings the curtain down on his illustrious career with a fourth-place finish in the Great North Run.
articles.title: Farah fourth in final race of career

articles.description: The second one-day international between England and New Zealand at The Ageas Bowl is delayed by rain.
articles.title: Second England v New Zealand ODI delayed by rain

articles.description: You could sense England's joy and relief at beating Argentina but there are still a ton of questions to answer, writes Tom English.
articles.title: 'Joy and relief for resilient England but still a ton of questions'

articles.description: Since a crushing Wimbledon exit, Coco Gauff has been the dominant player in the women's game, now she has won a first Grand Slam title.
articles.title: Why Gauff is 'burning so bright' after US Open win

articles.description: Watch highlights as ODI debutants Mahika Gaur and Lauren Filer take three wickets each as England beat Sri Lanka by seven wickets in the first one-day international at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: Highlights: England thrash Sri Lanka in first ODI

articles.description: England's conservative display proves soporific but does not take the shine off a remarkable show of Ukrainian unity in the Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: 'Dreary England cannot spoil Ukraine's special night'
